statements: SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM ProductRecommendations;
SELECT product_id, user_id, recommendation_score FROM ProductRecommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, product_id, timestamp FROM ProductRecommendations ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score, timestamp FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS recommendations_count FROM ProductRecommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(recommendation_score) AS max_score FROM ProductRecommendations GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY max_score DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, product_id FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY user_id ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(recommendation_score) AS avg_score FROM ProductRecommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM UserRecommendations
SELECT product_id, user_id, recommendation_score FROM UserRecommendations
SELECT recommendation_score, user_id, product_id FROM UserRecommendations
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory
SELECT product_id, purchase_date, user_id FROM PurchaseHistory
SELECT user_id, product_id, recommendation_score FROM UserRecommendations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, AVG(recommendation_score) AS avg_score FROM UserRecommendations GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(recommendation_score) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS num_products FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_products DESC
SELECT product_id, MAX(recommendation_score) AS max_score FROM UserRecommendations GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY max_score DESC

SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory JOIN UserRecommendations ON PurchaseHistory.user_id = UserRecommendations.user_id AND PurchaseHistory.product_id = UserRecommendations.product_id ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT username, email, user_id FROM users;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, user_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT users.username, products.product_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM users INNER JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'Anna%';
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, category FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(price) > 100;
SELECT user_name, email FROM recommendation_users WHERE gender = 'M'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50
SELECT user_name, age FROM recommendation_users ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' LIMIT 10
SELECT user_name, email, age FROM recommendation_users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT user_name, email, product_name, category, purchase_date FROM recommendation_users JOIN purchase_history ON recommendation_users.user_id = purchase_history.user_id JOIN products ON purchase_history.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_name ASC, purchase_date DESC;

SELECT user_name, email, category, price, confidence_score FROM recommendation_users JOIN recommendations ON recommendation_users.user_id = recommendations.user_id JOIN products ON recommendations.recommended_product_id = products.product_id WHERE confidence_score > 0.7 ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY user_id, product_id HAVING total_purchases > 1 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = '87654321-8765-4321-8765-432187654321' ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '1234';
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = '5678';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommended_product_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.5;

SELECT users.name AS user_name, products.name AS product_name, interactions.interaction_type FROM users INNER JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id INNER JOIN products ON interactions.product_id = products.product_id;
